name: crooked coffee cozy
designer_name: danyel pink for oombawka design crochet
notes:
the crooked coffee cozy is easy to customize to other sizes and a great stashbuster project. 

you will need approximately 32 yards (29 m) of medium worsted weight yarn (we used cotton) for this project. 

to make your coffee cozy more snug, work until you have a finished length of 7 inches (instead of 8 inches) - so approximately 20 rows in total.

to decrease the height of the coffee cup cozy, decrease the number of starting chains you use. for a 3 inch tall cozy begin with a chain of 19 (instead of 23).

[video tutorial here][1]

this pattern was originally designed by danyel pink. it is now available exclusively at oombawka design crochet.
